name: Project: Springbunny
description:
Project: Springbunny is a 3D platformer game, where you play as a bunny character with spring shoes! Jump, bounce, rail, and zoom around the map to collect all the coins in the best possible time!

We are releasing our prototype for free as we're looking for feedback! You'll see the build is restricted with a password that is available only on our discord server: https://discord.gg/943V9KV See you there :)

Thanks for your interest in testing out our game!

Make sure you follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter:
www.facebook.com/wearelunaticgames
www.instagram.com/wearelunaticgames
www.twitter.com/LunaticGames_
